div.style: width: 960px; height: 540px; padding: 60px; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif;

pre.style: background: #1e1e1e; color: #d4d4d4; padding: 25px; border-radius: 8px; font-family: monospace; font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.6; margin-bottom: 25px;

div.p: This function demonstrates data transformation using modern JavaScript.
